thread.title: Four Seasons appoints senior director marketing for UK hotels
thread.title_full: Four Seasons appoints senior director marketing for UK hotels

title: Four Seasons appoints senior director marketing for UK hotels
text:
Monday 28th September 2015 Four Seasons appoints senior director marketing for UK hotels 
Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts has appointed Vicki Richards as senior director of marketing for its UK Collection.In her new role, she oversees all sales and marketing activity for the luxury brand's UK properties in Hampshire, London's Canary Wharf and Park Lane, and at Ten Trinity Square which is due to open late 2016.Previously senior director of sales UK Collection, she takes over from Kristien Deleersnijder who has taken up the position of VP sales EMEA.
